actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a special export subsidy program for wheat, wheat flour, feed grains, and rice similar to the program that was in effect for such commodities during the calendar year 1971.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out an export subsidy program for wheat, wheat flour, feed grains, and rice, utilizing the funds and facilities of the Commodity Credit Corporation. Authorizes the Secretary to initiate such program upon a determination that it is necessary or appropriate (1) to prevent any substantial decrease in the annual export of such commodities or (2) to encourage such exports.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a special export subsidy program for wheat, wheat flour, feed grains, and rice similar to the program that was in effect for such commodities during the calendar year 1971.
